scripts.dev: concurrently -n API,WEB -c cyan,green "npm -w backend run dev" "npm -w frontend run dev"
scripts.build: npm -w backend run build && npm -w frontend run build
scripts.start: concurrently -n API,WEB -c cyan,green "npm -w backend run start" "npm -w frontend run start"
scripts.typecheck: npm -w backend run typecheck && npm -w frontend run build
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules packages/*/node_modules backend/dist frontend/.next
scripts.validate: npm run typecheck && npm run lint
